# Biome / Region Sheets

* For each location:
* Lighting mood
* Ambient color palette
* Architectural style
* Flora/Fauna concepts
* Weather/FX rules

# Modular Level Art Guidelines

* Tile kits
* Reusable props
* Scale rules
* Metric grid (VERY important for layout & blockouts)

# Surface & Materials

* Material library
* Rules for roughness/metallic contrast
* Environment storytelling through clutter, wear, damage
